title: Secure Password Manager
description: Develop an application that securely stores passwords using AES-256 encryption. The app will generate strong passwords and store credentials safely in a vault protected by multi-factor authentication.

title: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
description: Implement a two-factor authentication (2FA) system to enhance login security. Users will verify their identity using a code sent via email, SMS, or an authentication app.

title: Password Strength Checker
description: Create a tool that analyzes password strength using entropy calculations and common password databases. It will provide real-time feedback on how to improve security.

title: Biometric Authentication System
description: Develop a biometric authentication system using fingerprint or facial recognition technology. This project will help replace traditional passwords with more secure authentication methods.

title: Encrypted Password Sharing Platform
description: Build a secure platform for sharing encrypted passwords among trusted users. It will use end-to-end encryption to ensure that only authorized users can access shared credentials.
